channel.title: General on stefanwalther.io
channel.description: Recent content in General on stefanwalther.io

item.title: Yet another blog. Why?
item.description: I like to blog. I like to share. In the recent years I have primarily created content on qlikblog.at, then I shared quite some solutions & prototypes on GitHub and recently I have started a new blog called qliksite.io So why creating another blog? While all the efforts in the past primarily focused on projects, prototypes to spread the word in the Qlik ecosystem (QlikView, Qlik Sense & Qlik Analytics Plaform), there is just more I want to write about:
